description: French cinemagazine items:  1. Problems de jeunes (problems of youth) - A new centre built in the shadows of the Eiffel Tower provides a 24 hour information and docmentation service for young people; a school for apprentice jockeys; a school to try and identify future sports skills in 6-12 year olds. 2. Sport d'ete (summer sports) - Ancient game of polqua - a type of hand ball played with scooper catcher. 3. Les Arts (the arts) - National Museum of Ancient Law.
